mean_en: the state of being forced to do something because it is your duty, or because of a law, etc.; something which you must do because you have promised, because of a law, etc.
sentence: If you want to own a pet, you must fulfill all the associated obligations.
sentence_trans: 如果你想拥有一只宠物，你就必须履行所有的相关义务。
word_etyma: obligat使负义务 + ion名词后缀 → 有义务 → obligation责任
